error.no_device: No device found within your Roborock account
error.auth: Failed to login. Check your credentials

state.1: LiDAR turret or laser blocked. Check for obstruction and retry.
state.2: Bumper stuck. Clean it and lightly tap to release it.
state.3: Wheels suspended. Move robot and restart.
state.4: Cliff sensor error. Clean cliff sensors, move robot away from drops and restart.
state.5: Main brush jammed. Clean main brush and bearings.
state.6: Side brush jammed. Remove and clean side brush.
state.7: Wheels jammed. Move the robot and restart.
state.8: Robot trapped. Clear obstacles surrounding robot.
state.9: No dustbin. Install dustbin and filter.
state.13: Charging error. Clean charging contacts and retry.
state.15: Wall sensor dirty. Clean wall sensor.
state.16: Robot tilted. Move to level ground and restart.
state.21: Vertical bumper pressed. Move robot and retry.
state.22: Dock locator error. Clean and retry.
state.23: Could not return to dock. Clean dock location beacon and retry.
state.24: No-go zone or invisible wall detected. Move the robot.
state.27: VibraRise system jammed. Check for obstructions.
state.28: Robot on carpet. Move robot to floor and retry.
state.29: Filter blocked or wet. Clean, dry, and retry.
state.30: No-go zone or Invisible Wall detected. Move robot from this area.
state.31: Cannot cross carpet. Move robot across carpet and restart.
